Question
========

We compare 3 treatments using a Completely Randomized Design-ANOVA with 6 observations per treatment. The test size to see if the population averages of the treatments differ then follows an F-distribution with

Answerlist
----------

* 2 degrees of freedom in the numerator and 10 in the denominator.
* 2 degrees of freedom in the numerator and 15 in the denominator.
* 3 degrees of freedom in the numerator and 10 in the denominator.
* 3 degrees of freedom in the numerator and 15 in the denominator.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 2 degrees of freedom in the numerator and 10 in the denominator...: Incorrect
* 2 degrees of freedom in the numerator and 15 in the denominator...: Correct
* 3 degrees of freedom in the numerator and 10 in the denominator...: Incorrect
* 3 degrees of freedom in the numerator and 15 in the denominator...: Incorrect
